response.overview: Xiao Nong is a young farmer who has worshiped his ancestors from the time he was a child. When he prays to his ancestral spirits and his mother is not healed, he gets disillusioned. As a friend tells him the the good news, an animated Zhuang-style cartoon tells the gospel story from creation to Christ. He believes in Jesus, his life is changed, and he begins to tell his friends and family about his new faith.
response.title: The Story of Xiao Nong
